channel.title: Audition reel
channel.description:
Audition reels that were distributed to promote new radio programs on the National Association of Educational Broadcasters network.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Law in the news; medical milestones; business review; and books in the news.
item.description: This audition reel includes brief clips from four programs: Law in the News; Medical Milestones; Business Review; Books in the News.
item.dc:creator: Julin, Joseph R.
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature
